meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Fred Bernstein Dale Armstrong Tom Lawrence Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #847.

td.p: Fred Bernstein, an SAT tutor from West Cornwall, Connecticut
Dale Armstrong, a project manager from San Rafael, California
Tom Lawrence, a performing waiter from Davenport, Iowa (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,000)

tr.td: U.S. HISTORY
CHILDREN'S LITERATURE
HOMONYMS
BASEBALL
FURNITURE
TRIVIA

they did not sign any free agents

TomFred
Triple Stumper
')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
